review: This is literally my favorite purchase of 2014.  We don't have cable and used to have a Roku player.  This is SO much better than the Roku player.  Your iPhone becomes your remote.  I was worried that the resolution wouldn't be that great, but it is superb (I'm sure that depends on your internet connection speed, though).  It is fast, easy to use, very intuitive, and reasonably priced.  It's certainly the best option out there for people who don't have cable TV.  And the price certainly beats Roku or Apple TV.
